name: Automat
headline: AI enabled RPA using ChatGPT and computer vision
description:
Traditional automation software is slow and expensive, Automat is 10X faster and 1/10th the price. It lets operations teams automate using video and natural language.

üßê The problem: Traditional Robotic Process Automation is slow and expensive.
üí° Our Solution: Automat makes it 10X cheaper and faster to build any robotic process automation using natural language on any operating system

We‚Äôre solving this by creating a platform that enables robotics process automation for Chrome using large language models and computer vision.

Currently our customers send us descriptions or videos of the processes they‚Äôd like us to automate and we use our internal tooling to quickly build out those automations.

## Managed automations built and maintained by AI
How does it work? It‚Äôs easy:
##### 1. Input your request
Automat makes it as simple as demonstrating the tasks you want to automate. We accept:
  1. Screen recordings, video walkthroughs
  2. Process Design Documents (PDDs) or Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)
  3. Example documents or datasets for custom extraction


[Start custom workflowStart custom workflowStart custom workflow](https://www.runautomat.com/<#https://hijth7stfvb.typeform.com/to/oxCXyZ4g?typeform-source=www.runautomat.com>)
##### 2. Process and build
Our solutions engineers work closely with your team to deliver reliable automations. Automat AI agents & automations are engineered for:
  1. Observability - view status, progress and completion
  2. Reliability - automatic retries, manual interventions where needed.
  3. Analytics - unique analytics for each automation


[Start custom workflowStart custom workflowStart custom workflow](https://www.runautomat.com/<https:/hijth7stfvb.typeform.com/to/oxCXyZ4g?typeform-source=www.runautomat.com>)
##### 3. Simple deployment
Automat integrates seamlessly into your workflow or product. You can trigger automations through the following methods:
  1. Automat Workflow Manager
  2. Custom API endpoint
  3. Local trigger (Chrome extension) or desktop app


[Start custom workflowStart custom workflowStart custom workflow](https://www.runautomat.com/<https:/hijth7stfvb.typeform.com/to/oxCXyZ4g?typeform-source=www.runautomat.com>)

# FAQs
Answers to our most frequently asked questions and how we can help your business thrive through automation.
Have more questions?
[Contact UsContact UsContact Us](https://www.runautomat.com/<https:/hijth7stfvb.typeform.com/to/byeh2yki>)
### Once the automation is built, how does my team trigger and manage the automation?
We offer two types of triggers: one via API and another via the UI in the Automat Sandbox. We configure custom endpoints, tailored to the requirements of each automation, and generate a user interface that adapts to the needs of non-technical users.
### Can you integrate with our existing systems and software?
Automat leverages its proprietary transformer-based RPA engine to create automations on top of existing user interfaces. Our bots mimic human behavior, enabling us to deploy on challenging environments, including Windows, Citrix, and web portals.
### What kind of support do you offer after implementation?
While using our automation solutions, we guarantee results based on your Service Level Agreement (SLA). Our SLAs include Slack support, regular maintenance, and a 24-hour response time for support requests and tickets.
### What kind of timelines do the deployments follow?
Timelines depends on the project's complexity. For the best estimate, simply provide detailed workflow walk-throughs or example documents through the Automat request form before our introductory call.
### Is my data secure with Automat?
Yes. Every deployment from Automat adheres strictly to the highest standards of compliance and security, including GDPR and HIPAA. We ensure complete transparency, maintain audit trails, and implement rigorous data and access controls.

## Managed automations built and maintained by AI
How does it work? It‚Äôs easy:
##### 1. Input your request
Automat makes it as simple as demonstrating the tasks you want to automate. We accept:
  1. Screen recordings, video walkthroughs
  2. Process Design Documents (PDDs) or Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)
  3. Example documents or datasets for custom extraction


Start custom workflowStart custom workflowStart custom workflow‚ü®27‚ü©
##### 2. Process and build
Our solutions engineers work closely with your team to deliver reliable automations. Automat AI agents & automations are engineered for:
  1. Observability - view status, progress and completion
  2. Reliability - automatic retries, manual interventions where needed.
  3. Analytics - unique analytics for each automation


Start custom workflowStart custom workflowStart custom workflow‚ü®19‚ü©
##### 3. Simple deployment
Automat integrates seamlessly into your workflow or product. You can trigger automations through the following methods:
  1. Automat Workflow Manager
  2. Custom API endpoint
  3. Local trigger (Chrome extension) or desktop app

# FAQs
Answers to our most frequently asked questions and how we can help your business thrive through automation.
Have more questions?
Contact UsContact UsContact Us‚ü®8‚ü©
### Once the automation is built, how does my team trigger and manage the automation?
We offer two types of triggers: one via API and another via the UI in the Automat Sandbox. We configure custom endpoints, tailored to the requirements of each automation, and generate a user interface that adapts to the needs of non-technical users.
### Can you integrate with our existing systems and software?
Automat leverages its proprietary transformer-based RPA engine to create automations on top of existing user interfaces. Our bots mimic human behavior, enabling us to deploy on challenging environments, including Windows, Citrix, and web portals.
### What kind of support do you offer after implementation?
While using our automation solutions, we guarantee results based on your Service Level Agreement (SLA). Our SLAs include Slack support, regular maintenance, and a 24-hour response time for support requests and tickets.
### What kind of timelines do the deployments follow?
Timelines depends on the project's complexity. For the best estimate, simply provide detailed workflow walk-throughs or example documents through the Automat request form before our introductory call.
### Is my data secure with Automat?
Yes. Every deployment from Automat adheres strictly to the highest standards of compliance and security, including GDPR and HIPAA. We ensure complete transparency, maintain audit trails, and implement rigorous data and access controls.
